mkwfe module¶

Make a wave fromt error map

usage:

mkwfe.py [-h|–help] -t tel.json -e wfe.json -m wfe.fits

options:
--help

show this help message and exit

-t tel.json telescope parameter file -e wfe.json wave front error parameter file -m wfe.fits output wave front error map
